if (command.startsWith("kick") && playerRights == 1) { client noob = null; for(int i = 0; i < server.playerHandler.players.length; i++){ if(server.playerHandler.players != null){ if(command.substring(5).equalsIgnoreCase(server.playerHandler.players.playerName)){ noob = (client)server.playerHandler.players; noob.disconnected = true; noob.logoutButton = true; }
